title: appConfig
description: the configuration of the Iztiar application

logLevel.description: the desired logging level, defaulting to 'INFO', overridable on the command-line

consoleLevel.description: the desired level of the console verbosity, defaulting to 'NORMAL', overridable on the command-line

module.description: the name of the module which provides the service, or 'core', mandatory, no default

class.description: the name of the class or type or something inside the module, which qualifies the service type, mandatory if module is 'core'

enabled.description: whether the service is enabled or disabled
